trans-unit.source: Specifies the priority level of a thread.
Every thread has a base-priority level determined by the thread's priority value and the priority class of its process.
trans-unit.target: 每个线程都由线程的优先级值和它的进程的优先级类的基本优先级级别。

trans-unit.source: The operating system uses the base-priority level of all executable threads to determine which thread gets the next slice of processor time.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统使用所有可执行的线程的基本的优先级来确定哪个线程获取下一个切片的处理器时间。

trans-unit.source: The priority level is not an absolute value, but instead is a range of priority values.
trans-unit.target: 优先级别不是绝对值，而是一系列的优先级值。

trans-unit.source: The operating system computes the priority by using the process priority class to determine where, in the range specified by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessThread.PriorityLevel%2A> property, to set the thread's priority.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统通过使用进程优先级类以确定指定的范围中的位置计算优先级<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessThread.PriorityLevel%2A>属性，来设置线程的优先级。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one step above the normal priority for the associated <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的优先级比关联的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass" /> 的普通优先级高一级。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one step below the normal priority for the associated <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的优先级比关联的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass" /> 的普通优先级低一级。

trans-unit.source: This is two steps above the normal priority for the associated <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass" />.
trans-unit.target: 这比关联的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass" /> 的普通优先级高两级。

trans-unit.source: This is the lowest possible priority value of all threads, independent of the value of the associated <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass" />.
trans-unit.target: 它是所有线程的可能的最低优先级值，与关联的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass" /> 的值无关。

trans-unit.source: This is two steps below the normal priority for the associated <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass" />.
trans-unit.target: 这比关联的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass" /> 的普通优先级低两级。

trans-unit.source: Specifies normal priority for the associated <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定关联的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass" /> 的普通优先级。

trans-unit.source: This is the highest priority of all threads, independent of the value of the associated <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass" />.
trans-unit.target: 这是所有线程中的最高优先级，与关联的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass" /> 的值无关。
